title: The Seratones Rock The Tiny Desk With A Jungle Beat
teaser: NPR's Rachel Martin speaks to AJ Haynes and Adam Davis of the Louisiana rock band Seratones. The group had a entry to the recent NPR Music Tiny Desk Contest, though they didn't win the final prize.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
